title: Iron Border
body:
I wonder what an Iron border would looks like 

Sadly Iron being the lowest apart from bronze those 2 divisions never or will ever get a border. Feel bad for those players

replies.body: Guess there's 2 ways to find out, google it or just turn off your monitor for 10 or so games.
As far as I know borders won't be a thing for much longer. You'll get your ranked armour and banner border regardless of what rank you are, they'll just be less extravagant for iron.
